entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unreachable code CodeFixProvider crashes when FixAll is applied #61837
  • `SyntaxList<TNode>` doesn't return the original nodes when passing an `IEnumerable<TNode>` #61836

PullRequests

Created

  • Polish async suggestions #61840
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Serializable option set #61839
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61842
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61835
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #61834
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61833
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix VB compiler crashes when decoding attributes #61537
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix invalid cast when removing unreachable code in top-level programs #61830
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow shared projects to specify a real project to proxy too for building and testing in VS Code #60664
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unwrap the cause (inner exception) of operation canceled exceptions when reporting faults #61787
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members without implementation as a type argument #61775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
